Medicare's ""Home Health Compare"" tool. Go to http://www.medicare.gov and under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Compare Home Health Agencies in Your Area."" For more information on Medicare coverage of skilled nursing facility care, visit http://www.medicare.gov to look at or print a copy of the booklet ""Medicare Coverage of Skilled Nursing Facility Care."" (Under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Find a Medicare Publication."")",NIHSeniorHealth,Medicare and Continuing Care
